nodes.text: The Anaxes War College was a university on the planet Anaxes. Commissioned just months after the Clone Wars in the newly established Imperial Navy, Kassius Konstantine was a student of the Anaxes War College, and was one of the first in the new generation of officers of the Galactic Empire. The military field manuals used by the Empire were written by Anaxes War College instructors, along with other important military thinkers.
The Anaxes War College was first mentioned in the Star Wars canon in Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 35, a De Agostini magazine released on September 2, 2015.
